import React, { useState, useEffect } from 'react' import { Link } from 'react-router-dom' import { Row, Col, Image, ListGroup, Card, Button, ListGroupItem } from 'react-bootstrap' import Rating from '../components/Rating' const ProductScreen = ({ match }) => { const [product, setProduct] = useState({}) useEffect(() => { const fetchProduct = async () => { const { data } = await axios.get(`/api/products/${match.params.id}`) setProduct(data) } fetchProduct() }, []) return <> Go Back

{product.name}

 Price: ${product.price} Description: {product.description} price: ${product.price} Status: {product.countInStock > 0 ? 'In stock' : 'Out of Stock'} } export default ProductScreen
